item.name: getList
item.sql: SELECT t.create_time, t.down_channel_no, t.card_type, t.pay_type, t.business_type, sum(t.product_face) SumProductFace, sum(t.all_price) SumAllPrice, sum(t.all_order_cntr) allOrdCntr, sum(t.success_money) SucMoney, sum(t.success_order_cntr) sucOrderCntr, sum(t.success_coupon) SucCoupon, sum(t.service_fee) SumSerFee, sum(t.refund_money) SumRefMoney, sum(t.refund_order_cntr) SumRefOrdCntr, sum(t.loss_service) SumLossSer, t1.name Card, t2.name Pay, t3.name Business, dc.channel_name ChannelName, (case when decode(sum(t.success_order_cntr),0,0) = 0 or decode(sum(t.all_order_cntr),0,0) = 0 then 0 else round(sum(t.success_order_cntr) / sum(t.all_order_cntr)* 100,5) end) PayProbability, (case when decode(sum(t.refund_order_cntr),0,0) = 0 or decode(sum(t.success_order_cntr),0,0) = 0 then 0 else round(sum(t.refund_order_cntr) / sum(t.success_order_cntr)* 100,5) end)RefundProbability FROM Daily_Account_Snapshot t left join sys_dictionary t1 on t.Card_Type = t1.value and t1.type = 'CardType' left join sys_dictionary t2 on t2.value = t.Pay_Type and t2.type = 'PayType' left join sys_dictionary t3 on t3.value = t.Business_Type and t3.type = 'BusinessType' left join down_channel dc on t.down_channel_no = dc.down_channel_no where {@t.CreateTime >= to_date($ST,'yyyy-MM-dd')} {&@t.CreateTime < to_date($ET,'yyyy-MM-dd')+1} {&@t.DownChannelNo} {&@t.CardType} {&@t.PayType} {&@t.BusinessType} group by t.create_time,t.down_channel_no,t.card_type,t.pay_type,t.business_type,t1.name, t2.name,t3.name,dc.channel_name order by t.create_time desc
